pageProduct.name: Antipodes Hosanna Intensive H2O Skin Serum 30ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

A water-charged serum that immediately plumps thirsty skin while helping to intensively improve your skin appearance over time. Revolutionary antioxidant Vinanza Grape from New Zealand sauvignon blanc grapes helps powerfully protect and build resistance to damage caused by environmental aggressors and pollutants. Extract of mamaku black fern helps foster cell renewal, making this an everyday essential item for plump, healthy, youthful skin.
Elements of Beauty:  Vinanza Grape * Waiwera artesian water *  Mamaku black fern
Pure Plant Fragrance: Rose & cardamon
e30ml / 1.0fl oz

Warnings

EXTERNAL APPLICATION ONLY. PATCH TEST PRIOR TO USE. IN UNLIKELY EVENT OF NEGATIVE REACTION DISCONTINUE USE AND CONSULT HEALTH PRACTITIONER. RECYCLABLE GLASS. HANDLE WITH CARE. STORE IN COOL DARK PLACE BELOW 21°C. COLOUR AND CLARITY MAY VARY BETWEEN PRODUCTS DUE TO PURE NATURAL CONTENT. GOLD FLAKES MAY DISSOLVE AND ARE NOT ALWAYS VISIBLE. LOVE NATURE

Common Uses

SKINCARE

Ingredients

Lavandula angustifolia (lavender) distillate*, aqua (Waiwera® artesian) water, Cyathea medullaris (mamaku black fern leaf) extract, Vitis vinifera (Vinanza Grape® grape seed) extract, Naticide® (natural preservative), caprylic/capric triglyceride, xanthan gum, essential oil fragrances of French rose & cardamon: benzyl benzoate†, cinnamyl alcohol†, citral†, citronellol†, d-Limonene†, eugenol†, farnesol†, geraniol†, linanool†.
†  Component of essential oil
* Certified organic ingredient          
   Product certified organic by BioGro

Directions

Apply to your face, neck and décolletage before your favourite Antipodes face oil or moisturiser. Use daily for immediate hydration and the best long-term results. Suited to all skin conditions, especially water-deprived.
